text:
Baishnab Charan Parida (15 February 1941 – 22 November 2018) was a BJD politician, writer and social activist. He was a Member of Rajya Sabha (the upper house of India's Parliament) and represented Odisha. He was a Socialist. Parida was born in Jajpur, Odisha.
Parida died on 22 November 2018 from liver cancer in Bhubaneshwar, India at the age of 77.
